sections.MISSION: Bull Troop, 1st Squadron, 2CR executes M500/M17 qualification range at Range 122 on 25JUL24 IOT increase the lethality of the Troop and maintain proficiency.
sections.PURPOSE: Increase the lethality of the Troop and maintain proficiency
sections.KEY TASKS: in this phase will be proper police call of the range and accountability of all personnel and equipment. values: Range will immediately go to a dry status until communication with Range Control is restored

-PCCs/PCIs and frequent comms checks with Range Control -Leader Awareness and engagement

draw.overall_supervision_plan: OIC and Leadership will conduct a Range Reconnaissance to proof the range prior to the execution of the qualification. Convoy Commander will complete Convoy Ramp Brief prior to SP for the Range. OIC and RSO will orient Soldiers to the range, specifically highlighting the firing line, firing positions, range fans, ammo point, and clearing areas during the Safety Brief. Soldiers will coach/safety each other on the firing line with NCOs serving as safeties in a 1:2 ratio during the Shotgun Portion of the Range.
